nodes.text: Borgo Prime was a shadowport in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. Located on the Hydian Way, the former pirate Queen Maz Kanata marked it on a map that she included in the book that would eventually become known as the Smuggler's Guide.

In the current canon, Borgo Prime was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace. The location originates in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared as a spaceport built into an asteroid in the 1995 novel Young Jedi Knights: Shadow Academy, which was written by Kevin J. Anderson and Rebecca Moesta.
